title: Ten Mystical Doorways
summary: Buddhist practice notes and teachings - living-the-dharma-playlist-notes

thoughts.content:
# Ten Mystical Doorways

# Fourfold Dharma Realms

1. Dharma Realm of Phenomenon
    1. Physical world
2. Dharma Realm of Noumenon
    1. World of the mind
3. Non- Obstruction Between the Noumenon and the Phenomena
    1. No boundary between the mind and physical world
4. Non-Obstruction Among the Phenomena 
    1. No boundary between any phenomena 

# Ten Mystical Doorways

1. Simultaneous completion and mutual interaction
    1. One drop of water is the same as the entire ocean 
2. Unhindered and easy interactions between the vast and the narrow
    1. The part is the whole and all parts are equal
3. One and many containing one another yet being different
    1. One and many are the same 
    2. Our mind creates our reality
4. Mutual identity of all dharmas in freedom and ease
    1. All truths are paths to wisdom
    2. No path Carrie’s a better way 
    3. Everyone has a path
5. The hidden and the revealed being established together 
    1. The ultimate truth - noumenon
    2. The relative truth - phenomenon 
    3. Your reality reflects your inside world
6. Establishment and inter-containment of the subtle and minute
    1. 
7. Dharma realm like India’s net
    1. We exist like the pearls in India’s net 
    2. We are reflections of ourselves in others
8. Relying on phenomena to reveal dharmas and produce understanding 
    1. Interpreting the inside of them mind from the physical manifestations it has produced 
9. Different accomplishments of separate dharmas of the ten periods of time
    1. Time and space are relative and created by our mind
    2. Three times three times plus the now
10. Perfect illumination and virtues of the main and the companions
    1. Main person is Buddha 
    2. Many bodhisattvas exist to support our inner Buddha nature 
    3. We are both Buddha and bodhisattva
